channel.title: Little bit of help please [hosting]
channel.description: I have a really simple question, if I open up another port can I host another server on the new port? Example: I have a server running on port 43594, if I open up 43595 will I be able to host another server on that port? Because last time I tried it didn't work. If you know how I can do this please post. Help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Little bit of help please [hosting]
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Thanks, got it working.

Read full topic

item.title: Little bit of help please [hosting]
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Yes, It will work.
You must have two different servers.
Uhm Basically
In the server.java
Search 43594
Change That to 43595 Compile And Try That…
You will have same server Ip but different ports…

Read full topic
